mapper.select: SELECT companyInfo ,langLocale ,companyName ,companyAddress ,companyTel ,companyeEmail ,corporateRegistNumber ,corporateType ,operatingHours ,customerCenterTel ,privacyOfficer ,copyright ,faxNumber ,ceo FROM company_info WHERE langLocale = #{langLocale}

SELECT COUNT(mainBbsNo) as totalCount from( SELECT A.mainBbsNo FROM MAIN_BBS A, SUB_BBS B, (SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) AS ROWNUM WHERE A.isPublic ='Y' AND A.bbsType1 = '1' AND A.mainBbsNo = B.mainBbsNo ORDER BY A.mainBbsNo DESC )TEMP_T

SELECT totalCount ,mainBbsNo ,bbsType1 ,bbsType2 ,writerNo ,title ,content ,viewCount ,createTime ,updateTime ,ROWNUM from( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM board) AS totalCount ,A.mainBbsNo ,A.bbsType1 ,A.bbsType2 ,A.writerNo ,A.title ,A.content ,A.viewCount ,A.createTime ,A.updateTime ,(@RNUM := @RNUM + 1 ) AS ROWNUM FROM MAIN_BBS A, SUB_BBS B, (SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) AS ROWNUM WHERE A.isPublic ='Y' AND A.bbsType1 = '1' AND A.mainBbsNo = B.mainBbsNo ORDER BY A.mainBbsNo DESC )TEMP_T WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{S_SEQ} AND #{E_SEQ} ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC
SELECT A.mainBbsNo ,A.bbsType1 ,A.bbsType2 ,A.writerNo ,A.title ,B.content ,A.viewCount FROM main_bbs A, sub_bbs b WHERE A.isPublic ='Y' AND A.mainBbsNo = B.mainBbsNo AND A.mainBbsNo = #{mainBbsNo}
SELECT A.mainBbsNo ,A.bbsType1 ,A.bbsType2 ,A.writerNo ,A.title ,B.content ,A.viewCount FROM main_bbs A, sub_bbs B WHERE A.mainBbsNo = B.mainBbsNo AND A.isPublic = 'Y' AND A.mainBbsNo = #{mainBbsNo}

SELECT count(affiliateNo) as totalCount FROM affiliate WHERE 1 = 1
AND affiliateName LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{affiliateName}),'%')
AND affiliateAddress LIKE CONCAT('%',#{affiliateAddress},'%')
ORDER BY affiliateNo DESC

SELECT affiliateNo ,affiliateName ,affiliateAddress ,affiliateTel ,ROWNUM FROM( SELECT affiliateNo ,affiliateName ,affiliateAddress ,affiliateTel ,(@RNUM := @RNUM + 1 ) AS ROWNUM FROM affiliate , (SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) AS ROWNUM WHERE 1 = 1
AND affiliateName LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{affiliateName}),'%')
AND affiliateAddress LIKE CONCAT('%',#{affiliateAddress},'%')
ORDER BY affiliateNo DESC )TEMP_T WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN '1' AND '10' ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC
SELECT city_code, city_name FROM code_juso GROUP BY city_code, city_name
